pageTitle: IP Switching Cisco Express Forwarding Configuration Guide, Cisco IOS XE Release 3S (Cisco ASR 1000) - Configuring CEF Consistency Checkers [Support] - Cisco
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3640=Cisco Express Forwarding is enable by default on the Cisco ASR 1000 Series Aggregation Services Routers.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {27949=This sample output shows that two full scans are enabled and that every 60 seconds, 1000 prefixes are checked. It also shows that the auto repair function is enabled with the default settings of a 10-second delay and a 300-second holddown. In this example, no inconsistencies were found.}
textBeforeTable: Related Documents Additional References The RP is configured to send 3600 prefixes to the line cards every 225 seconds. end cef table consistency-check scan-rp-lc count 225 period 3600 ! configure terminal  The following example shows how to enable the scan-rp Cisco Express Forwarding consistency checker.   Example Enabling CEF Consistency Checkers Example Enabling CEF Consistency Checkers Configuration Examples for CEF Consistency Checkers  Router> Router# disable disable Use this command to exit to user EXEC mode. For example: Example:  Step 5     This sample output shows that two full scans are enabled and that every 60 seconds, 1000 prefixes are checked. It also shows that the auto repair function is enabled with the default settings of a 10-second delay and a 300-second holddown. In this example, no inconsistencies were found. Inconsistency statistics:
